snippet.title: Reimagining my favorite Flash game for the Playdate
snippet.description:
In this video, I'll be showing you how I made my latest Playdate game about piloting a propeller-strapped rat through increasingly challenging, hazard-filled worlds with crank-based movement! Loosely inspired by the Flash game "The World's Hardest Game".

You can pick it up on Catalog here: https://play.date/games/propeller-rat
Or on Itch IO here: https://squidgod.itch.io/propeller-rat

Source code: https://github.com/SquidGodDev/propeller-rat

Support me on Patreon!: https://www.patreon.com/squidgoddev
Join my Discord!: https://discord.gg/kDM8RU4aFt

Games mentioned:
- The World's Hardest Game: https://www.coolmathgames.com/0-worlds-hardest-game
- Hexa: https://play.date/games/hexa/
- Core Fault: https://play.date/dev/catalog/core-fault/
- The King's Dungeon: https://squidgod.itch.io/the-kings-dungeon

Videos mentioned:
- Metroidvania tutorial: https://youtu.be/7GbUxjE9rRM
- Grid view tutorial: https://youtu.be/vhwWC4PfXfc
